description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
Feature
PDFNEWNET-39400	Add and search hidden text in PDF document for post processing

Enhancements
PDFNEWNET-38234	Using same Page object after ProcessPragraphs() call

Exceptions
PDFNEWNET-40255	PDF to PDFA conversion throws System.NullReferenceException
PDFNEWNET-40319	ArgumentOutOfRangeException during PDF creation
PDFNEWNET-39708	Issue checking signature information in PDF file
PDFNEWNET-39649	Exception when trying to convert PDF to Image

Bugs
PDFNEWNET-40241	PDF to PDFA3a: appearance for annotations changed to blue rectangles
PDFNEWNET-40059	Loading corrupt file with Aspose.Pdf casuses infinite loop
PDFNEWNET-39523	XFA form to standard PDF form conversion throws internal exception
PDFNEWNET-40223	PDF to PDFA3a: compliance issue - Document contains JavaScripts
PDFNEWNET-33518	PDF -> PDF/A conversion/validation fails with NullReferenceException
PDFNEWNET-40334	Formatting of header row (repeat row) in table not maintaining formatting
PDFNEWNET-40038	Right Alignment of Text is not working
PDFNEWNET-39250	Rotate method is not working for FreeTextAnnotation
PDFNEWNET-38033	PDF/A - PDF with transparency produces incorrect results
PDFNEWNET-34732	Unable to embed font in existing PDF file
PDFNEWNET-40278	VerticalInSamePage property of TableBroken enum issue in nested table
PDFNEWNET-40252	Footnote larger than a single page drops both page text and footnote from resultant PDF page
PDFNEWNET-40232	Page number is being truncated from second level of Heading in TOC
PDFNEWNET-40120	HTML to PDF: Radio buttons are rendering incorreclty
PDFNEWNET-40087	API throws CrossTableNotFound Exception
PDFNEWNET-39764	PDF to JPEG: resultant images are distorted
PDFNEWNET-39620	HTML to PDF: CSS Transform property is not supportd
PDFNEWNET-39253	PDF(generated by Aspose.Slides) to PDFA3B
PDFNEWNET-39252	PDF(generated by Aspose.Slides) to PDFA3A
PDFNEWNET-39251	PDF(generated by Aspose.Cells) to PDFA3A
PDFNEWNET-38891	PDF(with table) to Image conversion adds white border in resultant image
PDFNEWNET-38847	API throws NullReferenceException on load a PDF document
PDFNEWNET-38552	Saving/manipulating PDF document results in corrupt PDF
PDFNEWNET-40251	Footnote issue in multi-column PDF
PDFNEWNET-40222	Page Text and Footnote overlap
PDFNEWNET-38753	PCL to PDF - PCL Line Termination is ignored
PDFNEWNET-38741 PCL to PDF - Special graphics characters are not being honored
PDFNEWNET-40287 Unable to save tables with large data in cells
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
